Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Tampa Bay in 2007...
Injured on 6/26/2007 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 8/24/2009 with a Strained Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 8/2/2011, off Johan Santana (CHA)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/12/2011, off Kyle Lohse (BOS)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Baltimore on 8/6/2012...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/2012, hitting .560 with 6 HR, 15 RBI...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Drove in 7 runs against Boston on 4/6/2015...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 6/22/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/29/2015, hitting .370 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2015, hitting .357 with 9 HR, 25 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 7/25/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/13/2016, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Milwaukee on 6/16/2017 (Going to MIL: C B. De La Rosa, DH B. Belt, CF T. Wheeler, P L. Shaw. Going to TB: P J. Gobble, 1B N. Swisher, CF G. Springer, 1B S. Buckley, SS T.
Tomiichi)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Atlanta on 8/8/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/10/2018, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against St. Louis on 4/30/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/6/2019, hitting .464 with 5 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Diego on 9/25/2019...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 2019, hitting .321 with 51 HR, 128 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 5/16/2020...
Hit 3 homeruns against Pittsburgh, driving in 5 runs on 5/20/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/23/2020, hitting .474 with 6 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/25/2020, hitting .440 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
